definitions.definition: An impressive seat used by a monarch , often on a raised dais in a throne room and reserved for formal occasions .
Leadership , particularly the position of a monarch .
examples: The prince's newborn baby is fifth in line to the throne .

definitions.definition: The seat of a bishop in the cathedral-church of his diocese ; also, the seat of a pope .
A kind of stool used by drummers .
A member of an order of angels ranked above dominions and below cherubim .

main_definition: An impressive seat used by a monarch , often on a raised dais in a throne room and reserved for formal occasions .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Leadership , particularly the position of a monarch .
The seat of a bishop in the cathedral-church of his diocese ; also, the seat of a pope .
( music ) A kind of stool used by drummers .
( Christianity ) A member of an order of angels ranked above dominions and below cherubim .
